text: Meghan Markle has moved on after her glamorous wedding to Prince Harry, RadarOnline. com has learned exclusively, leaving her American friends and family in her glittering dust. On the latest episode of the popular podcast Straight Shuter!, host Rob Shuter reveals the newest member of the Harry ’ s royal family is putting her past behind her. “ Her old friends feel a little bit dumped, ” a source told Shuter. “ First, they attended her wedding at their own expense, and now Meghan is a little too busy for all of them. ” PHOTOS : Royal BFFs?
